short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert YouTube links to embedded versions when clicked.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When clicking on Youtube links it converts the URL to the embed version. Click the videos thumbnail or title (Green) to open in Embed version and click the videos description (Blue) to open normally.
